definition: one in a hundred/cream of the crop

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: eg: She's one in a million.
Mr Weston is such an excellent man.
sentences.chinese: 韦斯顿先生是百里挑一的人。

sentences.english: The creamofthe crop is a good step by step closer to me.
sentences.chinese: 百里挑一的好日子正一步一步地向我靠近。

sentences.english: He is one in a thousand.
I want to introduce you to a person who is one in a million.
sentences.chinese: 我要介绍给你的人可真正是百里挑一的啊。

sentences.english: He is really one in a million.
The guy who I wanna introduce to you is one in a million .
sentences.chinese: 我要介绍给你的人可真正是百里挑一的啊。

sentences.english: She thinks her husBand is a man in a million.
sentences.chinese: 她认为她的丈夫是百里挑一的好人。

sentences.english: She is a girl in a million.
sentences.chinese: 她是个百里挑一的姑娘。

sentences.english: The person I would love to introduce to you is one of a million.
sentences.chinese: 我要介绍给你的人可真正是百里挑一的啊。

definition: lit. as rare as phoenix feathers and unicorn horns (idiom)/fig. few and far between
top-notch (colloquial)/to push oneself to the front
erhua variant of 拔尖[ba2 jian1]
best of its kind/cream of the crop
well versed in letters and military technology (idiom); fine scholar and soldier/master of pen and sword
there are no poor soldiers under a good general (idiom)
pinyin: qiang2 jiang4 shou3 xia4 wu2 ruo4 bing1

definition: to win an election/to get a position by passing the imperial exam
